akn:content.akn:p:
§ 427e. Repealed. Aug. 11, 1955, ch. 790, § 2, 69 Stat. 674
Section, act June 29, 1935, ch. 338, title I, § 6, 49 Stat. 438, defined “Territory”. See section 361a of this title.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Existing Rights and LiabilitiesAny rights or liabilities existing under this section unaffected by repeal, see section 2 of act Aug. 11, 1955, set out as a note under former section 361 of this title.
